name: Build a wooden shelter
goal: Safe shelter with foundation, walls, roof, and door

steps.title: Analyze & Inventory Check
steps.details: Check inventory. Calculate total blocks needed (approx 200 for 7x7 house). IF INSUFFICIENT: Generate 'craft' or 'gather' steps IMMEDIATELY.

steps.title: Clear & Level
steps.details: Move to the planned origin and clear space if needed.

steps.title: Foundation
steps.details: Place the floor. USE THE SAME ORIGIN COORDINATE FOR ALL STEPS. params: { "structure": "platform", "width": 7, "length": 7, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {x,y,z} }

steps.title: Install Door
steps.details: Place the door BEFORE walls to ensure the 2x1 block gap is correct. params: { "structure": "door", "material": "oak_door", "origin": {SAME_AS_ABOVE} }

steps.title: Roof
steps.details: Build the roof last on top (y+4). params: { "structure": "roof", "width": 7, "length": 7, "material": "oak_planks", "origin": {SAME_AS_ABOVE, but y+4} }
